amendment.description: Amendment redirects $6,000,000 within the State and Tribal Assistance Grants account.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 21 printed in House Report 114-683 to decrease and increase State and Tribal Assistance Grants by $6 million to direct the EPA to work with the affected States and Indian tribes to implement a long-term monitoring program for water quality of the Animas and San Juan Rivers in response to the Gold King Mine spill.
